name: ConnectedCary
0:
”Alexa, open connected cary”
”Alexa, ask connected cary what is my trash day”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: connected cary
des: If you are a resident of Cary, this skill will help you answer all your questions about the various facilities that Cary provides. For instance, if you want to know what your trash day is, you can simply ask Alexa, "what's my trash day." Or, let's say you want to know what the open-gym time is for Tennis. Then, you can ask Alexa, "what is the open gym time for Tennis." Currently, this skill supports only the Trash Day and Gym Time Information functions, but future updates will incorporate many more services!
